title: Scientists capture 51 images showing exoplanets coming together around other stars: 'This data set is an astronomical treasure'
description: The Very Large Telescope's SPHERE instrument captured unprecedented images of 51 dusty rings shaping young planetary systems.
content: The Very Large Telescope's SPHERE instrument captured unprecedented images of 51 dusty rings shaping young planetary systems.
